content.text:
[@Musickiller's mkpcwin7 & mkpcarch0](@lkJY27pfP1xK8sU2b97ULEfFF/X0IRFcLc7/Q/wNMRw=.ed25519) 

How does APNG compare to video as a GIF alternative? In the past I've usually just converted to MP4 and it seems to be tiny *and* accessible. I suppose APNG probably has the benefit of alpha transparency?
